content.title: TEVAR for Type B Dissection
content.description: Thoracic endovascular aortic repair for Type B aortic dissection

key_concepts.details: Complicated: malperfusion, rupture, uncontrolled pain/hypertension - urgent TEVAR indicated
Medical management first-line; consider preemptive TEVAR for high-risk features
Entry tear >10mm, false lumen >22mm, partial thrombosis, aortic growth
Cover entry tear, promote true lumen expansion and false lumen thrombosis

content.clinical_significance: TEVAR improves remodeling outcomes in uncomplicated TBAD
content.statement: TEVAR for Type B Dissection is a fundamental concept in Health-Sciences Medicine Surgery Vascular Pathology Aortic-Dissection that provides essential knowledge for understanding related topics and clinical/practical applications.

explanation.intuition: Understanding TEVAR for Type B Dissection helps build foundational knowledge. The concept connects to broader principles in the field.
explanation.key_insight: The key aspects of TEVAR for Type B Dissection include core principles, common applications, and integration with related concepts.
explanation.technical_details: Technical details involve specific mechanisms, measurements, and evidence-based applications of TEVAR for Type B Dissection.
